alert.note: Alert for Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 6:55PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Cochise County through 745 PM MST... At 654 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bisbee, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, pea size hail and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bisbee and Naco. This includes the following highways... Route 80 between mile markers 335 and 353. Route 92 between mile markers 347 and 355. Route 191 between mile markers 10 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
